item.title: Maura add a quote by Norman Vincent Peale
item.description: "Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars." -- Norman Vincent Peale

item.title: Maura add a quote by Billy Ray Cyrus
item.description: "He'll get tired of chasing someone who doesn't chase back!" -- Billy Ray Cyrus

item.title: Maura add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "From there to here, from here to there, funny things are everywhere!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Maura add a quote by Katt Williams
item.description: "Did you know that I can see you?" -- Katt Williams

item.title: Maura add a quote by Judy Schachner
item.description: "My ears are too beeg for my head. My head ees too beeg for my body. I am not a Siamese cat ... I AM A CHIHUAHUA!" <i>-- Skippyjon Jones (In his very best Spanish accent)</i>" -- Judy Schachner

item.title: Maura add a quote by Tom Jones
item.description: "You're...standing...in...my...KUMQUATS!" -- Tom Jones

item.title: Maura add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Hobbes: Jump! Jump! Jump! I win! Calvin: You win? Aaugghh! You won last time! I hate it when you win! Aarrggh! Mff! Gnnk! I hate this game! I hate the whole world! Aghhh! What a stupid game! You must have cheated! You must have used some sneaky, underhanded mindmeld to make me lose! I hate you! I didn't want to play this idiotic game in the first place! I knew you'd cheat! I knew you'd win! Oh! Oh! Aarg! [Calvin runs in circles around Hobbes screaming "Aaaaaaaaaaaa", then falls over.] Hobbes: Look, it's just a game. Calvin: I know! You should see me when I lose in real life!" -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Maura add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "It's kind of fun to do the impossible." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Maura add a quote by Edith Konecky
item.description: "I have a terrible memory; I never forget a thing." -- Edith Konecky

item.title: Maura add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "When beetles fight these battles in a bottle with their paddles and the bottle's on a poodle and the poodle's eating noodles... ...they call this a muddle puddle tweetle poodle beetle noodle bottle paddle battle." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Maura add a quote by Robert Half
item.description: "No one can be right all the time, but it helps to be right most of the time. " -- Robert Half

item.title: Maura add a quote by Steven Wright
item.description: "What's another word for thesaurus?" -- Steven Wright

item.title: Maura add a quote by Stephanie Klein
item.description: "Tell the truth, or someone will tell it for you." -- Stephanie Klein

item.title: Maura add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "People, generally, suck." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Maura add a quote by Scott Adams
item.description: "I love you like a fat kid loves cake!" -- Scott Adams

item.title: Maura add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "The reason I talk to myself is because I’m the only one whose answers I accept." -- George Carlin

item.title: Maura add a quote by Steven Wright
item.description: "Right now I’m having amnesia and déjà vu at the same time. I think I’ve forgotten this before." -- Steven Wright

item.title: Maura add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Reality continues to ruin my life." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Maura add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "It is said that your life flashes before your eyes just before you die. That is true, it's called Life." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Maura add a quote by Thomas Szasz
item.description: "Two wrongs don't make a right, but they make a good excuse." -- Thomas Szasz

item.title: Maura add a quote by Hilary Duff
item.description: "Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game." -- Hilary Duff

item.title: Maura add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Maura add a quote by A.A. Milne
Maura add a quote by Henri Nouwen
item.description: "When we honestly ask ourselves which person in our lives mean the most to us, we often find that it is those who, instead of giving advice, solutions, or cures, have chosen rather to share our pain and touch our wounds with a warm and tender hand. The friend who can be silent with us in a moment of despair or confusion, who can stay with us in an hour of grief and bereavement, who can tolerate not knowing, not curing, not healing and face with us the reality of our powerlessness, that is a friend who cares." -- Henri Nouwen

item.title: Maura add a quote by Marlene Dietrich
item.description: "It's the friends you can call up at 4 a.m. that matter." -- Marlene Dietrich

item.title: Maura add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Maura add a quote by Muhammad Ali
item.description: "Friendship is the hardest thing in the world to explain. It's not something you learn in school. But if you haven't learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven't learned anything." -- Muhammad Ali

item.title: Maura add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "What is a friend? A single soul dwelling in two bodies." -- Aristotle

item.title: Maura add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Maura add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes." -- Mark Twain
